name: Verdure
description:
It's 20XX, the greed of humans have taken them so far that they even attempt to alternate the natural DNAs of vegetables and fruits. Well, to summarize, it all went wrong.

You play as a banana stripper. There's nothing much to be said. This game is weird. It has three endings and a lil secret, owo.

It's my first game ever XD! I'm excited to share this in public but also nervous, obviously. This game is extremely rushed because I plan to make a new project. The quality isn't also the best, but it was a good first try imo. Criticism will be appreciated!!

Music credit in the note 'music', thank you so much for all the non-copyrighted music creators I used. Made with RPG Maker MV.

Thx for reading and have fun!
